attributes.action: resign as goverment and MP along with all the rest of the MPs as the people who voted you in no longer have confidence in any of the serving MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the spurious claims for expenses now exposed, that has no doubt being going on for a long time, is now not time for every MP to resign his or her seat and try to win it back in an election now, that way the people can decide who they want to govern and sit in parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
